mapper.select: SELECT A.REVIEW_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.REVIEW_TITLE, A.REVIEW_CREATE_DATE, A.REVIEW_HIT, A.REVIEW_STAR FROM REVIEW_BRD A ORDER BY A.REVIEW_NO DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_BRD (CAMP_NO, NICKNAME, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_IP, REVIEW_HIT) VALUES (#{campNo}, #{nickname}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewStar}, #{reviewContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d'), #{reviewIp}, 0)
